body_html:
@ematvey : Thanks very much for doing this! Glad to see it. I'd encourage you to publish your findings, but AFAIK, the new seq2seq API isn't in a state to provide official tutorials for just yet.

CCing @ebrevdo so that he is aware of your notebook, but closing this out for now.

body:
@ematvey : Thanks very much for doing this! Glad to see it. I'd encourage you to publish your findings, but AFAIK, the new `seq2seq` API isn't in a state to provide official tutorials for just yet. 

CCing @ebrevdo so that he is aware of your notebook, but closing this out for now.
